extension.description: This addon can play and test various video and audio content from various sources supported by Streamlink resolver library. It can also playback MPEG-DASH streams.
extension.disclaimer: This addon does not provide any content, its sole purpose is to resolve web urls with the help of Streamlink resolver library
extension.description: Το πρόσθετο αυτό μπορεί να αναπαράγει και να δοκιμάσει περιεχόμενο βίντεο και ήχου από διάφορες πηγές μέσω της βιβλιοθήκης streamlink. Επίσης μπορεί να αναπαράξει ροές MPEG-DASH.
extension.disclaimer: Το πρόσθετο αυτό δεν παρέχει απολύτως κανένα περιεχόμενο, ο μοναδικός σκοπός είναι να επιλύσει ιστοσελίδες με την βοήθεια του streamlink.
extension.news:
[B]1.5.4[/B] - 15-08-2020 - Minor tweak in the addon.xml - Removed optional dependency of youtube-dl
[B]1.5.3[/B] - 01-03-2020 - Some logging tweaks
[B]1.5.2[/B] - 11-11-2019 - Enhanced context menu items - Added sleep when doing file operations (useful for slower devices) - Bug fixes, mostly player related
[B]1.5.1[/B] - 23-08-2019 - Add exception to headers object loop finder in case it fails
[B]1.5.0[/B] - 20-06-2019 - Updated generic plugin (thank you back-to) - Added youtube-dl as optional dependency to augment the generic plugin - Added ability to set custom title from plugin url - Added ability to set custom thumbnail from plugin url (as "image" parameter)

extension.summary: Cryptocurrency Pricing and Market Cap Rankings for Kodi
extension.description: Now you can track the price of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin and all the other cryptocurrencies directly from your television! This nifty Kodi addon also allows you to set alerts that will notify you when your selected cryptocurrency hits a predetermined price point.

extension.description: Este complemento le ayudará a configurar las claves de la API del complemento Youtube.
extension.news:
[B]+ 2.1.0[/B] ~ (07-08-2020) - Add support for paste.osmc.tv - Added hindi support (contrib: spyderboy92) - Added swedish support (contrib: Sopor) - Clean up
[B]+ 2.0.2[/B] ~ (22-04-2020) - Minor tweak for yesno dialog (for Kodi 19)
[B]+ 2.0.1[/B] ~ (22-04-2020) - Added the following translations: > German: thanks to horstle > Spanish: thanks to roliverosc
[B]+ 2.0.0[/B] ~ (06-04-2020) - Proper Python 3 support - Added support for hastebin.com - Simplified setup function - Removed "youtube.api.enable" setting for post 6.7.0 youtube addon versions - Added support for google's client.json file from the credentials screen > If api_key is not found in the json file, youtube setup will ask to be entered manually > You can enter it in the file prior to the setup just by adding an additional key, see client.json example - Added the following translations: > Romanian: thanks to tmihai20 > Dutch: thanks to dagwieers > Russian: thanks to vlmaksime - Bug fixes

extension.description: This addon can play and test various video and audio content from various sources supported by ResolveURL library.

extension.news: 1.0.X ~ 05-01-2020 - 19-01-2021 - Initial Version, forked from Reddit Browser - Replaced urlresolver with resolveurl - Changed some default settings - Several bug fixes - Changed artwork - Changed user agent string - Changed app token - Restored a window call function which didn't work on Leia - Removed "depth" variable because it was supposed to be used on flat comments tree - Fixed saved items menu - Fixed user icon for my account menu - Fixed some misbehaviour on search menus - Fixed reddit videos playback - Removed capability to install plexus - Simplified actions on advanced authorization option - Added a cancellation button and exception handling on wrong username/password - Optionally notify user on token refresh, now defaults to off - Optionally open the first time prompt (read me) - Removed the authorization options except the login with user/pass - Various other minor tweaks

extension.summary: Upload Debug Logs to Shareable Location
extension.description: This add-on gives you the ability to upload your Kodi error logs to a shareable location, and can also optionally email you the link to your logs. Before you get started, be sure to Toggle ON the “Enable debug logging” function under the SYSTEM -> Settings -> System -> Logging menu within Kodi.

extension.description: Full Length Bollywood Movies in HD
Configure Kodi with all the Best Goodies!
Multi-source subtitles addon optimized for Seren. Supports: OpenSubtitles, BSPlayer, Podnadpisi.NET, Subscene, Addic7ed
extension.news:
[v2.2.0]: * Fix KODI 19 Matrix support
[v2.1.0]: * Fix Persian search in Subscene
[v2.0.0]: * Use IMDb as main source for all meta. * Retry on 503 (Service Unavailable). OpenSubtitles and Subscene seems to return it occasionally.
[v1.8.0]: * Remove SubDb (Site is down) * Make lib vfs optional since there are fallbacks and it is used as last case scenario. Thus making the addon installable on platforms which are not supported by lib vfs.
[v1.7.2]: * Improve results sort based on title match
[v1.7.1]: * Drop python meta as it prevents installations on pre Kodi 19 versions
[v1.7.0]: * Update python meta to enable Kodi 19 installations
[v1.6.0]: * Add option to auto download first subtitle result silently
[v1.5.0]: * Auto open search dialog only on movie and tvshow videos
[v1.4.0]: * Add option to auto open the search dialog when the video does not have subtitles
[v1.3.0]: * Improve tvshow year scraping
[v1.2.0]: * Use internal ZipFile for extraction with a fallback to vfs.libarchive
[v1.1.0]: * Improve imdb id scraping
[v1.0.1]: * Add screenshots
[v1.0.0]: * Invalidate BSPlayer results cache when download links expire * Extraction fallback: zip -> gzip -> raw
[v0.0.30]: * Add service names in ad detection * Removed the option to disable cleaning of ads * Add remote fetching of addic7ed data
[v0.0.29]: * Fix Podnadpisi download of results missing filename meta * Fix last results cache not invalidated on language preferences change
[v0.0.28]: * Attempt scrape of imdb id when missing * Improve filename parsing * Fix SubDB lang code * Fix Podnadpisi not returning release name
[v0.0.27]: * Attempt to auto-fix a garbled cyrillic encoded subtitles * Fix more encoding issues * Ensure progress dialog close even if the addon crashes * Apply color to service name in results and bold tags * Show notification if imdb id is missing
[v0.0.26]: * Support for Addic7ed * Improve cache of the last results * Don't show progress when showing results from cache
[v0.0.25]: * Fix cancellation thread exit
[v0.0.24]: * Show progress dialog only for search
[v0.0.23]: * Add progress dialog * Support cancellation
[v0.0.22]: * Fix meta string conversion issue
[v0.0.21]: * TVShow year scrape from imdb when necessary
[v0.0.20]: * Improve Subscene tvshow matching * Extract first sub file from zips when none is matched * Fix Podnadpisi not working properly for tvshows * Fix non-ascii video file title issues * Add tvshow tests
[v0.0.19]: * Update settings * Fix language code suffix format in the subtitle file name * Support for Subscene
[v0.0.18]: * Support for Podnadpisi.NET * Support for SubDB
[v0.0.17]: * Reuse KODI's Python language invoker * Improves performance on low-end devices when switching subtitles for best match * Url decode subtitle names
[v0.0.16]: * Cache last result * OpenSubtitles always queries: * by imdb id and title * by video file hash * Improve results ordering: * preferred lang * lang * synced * name match * rating * hearing impaired * subtitle service * Fix url with numbers matching in ads detection
[v0.0.15]: * Remove ads by default * Support for BSPlayer * Additional option for OpenSubtitles to use file hash (Limits results to exact matches)
[v0.0.14]: * Fix API and normal usage at the same time
[v0.0.13]: * Exclude development files from release
[v0.0.12]: * Removal of ads (Experimental) * Fix extract issue when file contains unicode symbols
[v0.0.11]: * Changelog in KODI
[v0.0.10]: * Inserted language code in sub filename
[v0.0.9]: * Implemented (orginal, default, none, forced_only) as KODI language setting * Fixed minor bugs in API implementation * Added .idea folder to .gitignore
[v0.0.8]: * opensubtitles should make max 2 requests for separate languages * lint updates * add tests for download
[v0.0.7]: * API class rename
[v0.0.6]: * fix core requiring handle even with API usage
[v0.0.5]: * expose API for usage without KODI * add tests for search
[v0.0.4]: * distribution process: * KODI repository with updates based on github releases * addons.xml and addons.xml.crc auto generation via git hooks * release automation on merge to master via Github Actions
[v0.0.3]: * general settings for configuring requests timeout and results limit * additional ordering of the results depending on the similarity ratio of the video file name and the subtitle file name
[v0.0.2]: * improve archive extraction support * limit the results and add requests timeout * fix OpenSubtitles authentication * handle debug logging detection issues
[v0.0.1]: * initial working version (search and download subtitles) * OpenSubtitles support with optional authentication * results ordering with preferred language ordered first

extension.description: Install/Download Apk from Aptoide APK Store
Auto download the best subtitle automatically as soon you start the video. Special thanks to OpenSubtitles.org for providing a unique UA for Subloader.
extension.news:
0.1.4 23.07.2019 Added Dutch language (Special thanks to Tinuz97). Clean up project files.
0.1.3 21.07.2019 Added OS user login. Fixed debug option. Added more debug information. Massive code rewrite. Several optimizations. Added audio language exclusions. Added video addon exclusions. Improved sorting settings. Improved settings layout. Added Do nothing option.
0.1.2 17.06.2019 Added a unique User Agent from Opensubtitles.org.
0.1.1 12.06.2019 Fixed release detection bug. Fixed typo.
0.1.0 10.06.2019 Fixed instalation bug. Fixed notifications bug. Started Beta convergence. Added default behavior selection. Added auto donwload any subtitle if no match found. Updated settings xml. Updated strings po. Release type detection improved.

extension.description: Search and download subtitles from various sites
Εύρεση και λήψη υποτίτλων από διαφόρους ιστοτόπους
extension.disclaimer: This service is only for Greek subtitles. It is not published nor endorsed by any of the sites supported.

extension.news:
[B]3.4.0 - 3.4.1[/B] - Code related tweaks, particularly how routing is handled - Added ability to save locally subtitles and/or zips from sources
[B]3.3.1[/B] - Added the forgotten string
[B]3.3.0[/B] - Improved search query function, added accompanying option
[B]3.2.5[/B] - Tweaked imports
[B]3.2.4[/B] - More bug fixes for vipsubs.gr (failure to load nested zip on Android) - Removed builtin methods from other provides
[B]3.2.3[/B] - Bug fixes for vipsubs.gr
[B]3.2.2[/B] - Do not allow random choice when not necessary
[B]3.2.1[/B] - Added capability for nested zips on vipsubs.gr - Skip certain results not containing subtitles on vipsubs.gr
[B]3.2.0[/B] - Bumped dependencies - Improved cache clear function - Added vipsubs.gr - Lots of bug fixes
[B]3.1.X[/B] - Tweaked regexes for searches - Added a setting allowing users to set search and download timeouts - Added visual feedback when deleting function cache - Disabled subs4free.info

extension.language: en cs de es fr he hr hu it ja ko nl pl pt ro sv tr zh
extension.news: v1.15.0 (2021-04-02) NOTICE TO PARENTAL CONTROL: THE OLD PARENTAL CONTROL WITH PIN IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED, HAS BEEN DEPRECATED BY NETFLIX SINCE LAST YEAR, IF YOU KEEP USING IT YOU MUST UPDATE YOUR ACCOUNT PARENTAL CONTROL SETTINGS. - Fixes due to website changes (fix KeyError loco) - Removed the deprecated Parental Control (with PIN protection) - Improved playback startup speed - Enabled IPC over HTTP by default, IPC over AddonSignals lead to a memory leak (Kodi bug) - IPC now use only Pickle - Add missing support to IPC over AddonSignals for the cache - Joined all HTTP servers to one multithreaded to save resources - Used a single web session instead of two distinct (nfsession/MSL) - Cleaned many part of source code (nfsession/MSL/directory/IPC/...) - Update translations zh_tw, gr

extension.description:
Provide a mapping between Super Favourites plugin + IPTV channels + XMLTV of your choice, 1) Mandatory: Choose your XMLTV location 2) Mandatory: Choose your Super Favourites folder that will contain auto created sub folder where you will put your iptv links 3) Option: Tune options like timezone, etc... ( optional settings tab ) 4) Style: Customize your SFX look and feel ( look and feel tab ). 5) Add your iptv links to the correct folder ( with super favourites regular addon ) 6) Start the plugin
All contributions are welcome: coding / tests debug / translations / donations, our mail and paypal address : 007.nux@gmail.com

Fournit un mapping entre le plugin Super Favourites + vos liens IPTV + votre fichier XMLTV, 1) Obligatoire: Définissez l'endroit ou se trouve votre fichier XMLTV. 2) Obligatoire: Choisissez le répertoire Super Favourites qui contiendra les sous répertoires créés automatiquement, ou vous irez placer vos liens iptv. 3) Optionnel: Affinez vos paramètres de time shift, etc ... ( onglet optionnel ) 4) Style: Customisez le style de la grille epg ( Style ) 5) Peuplez les sous dossiers avec vos liens IPTV ( avec le plugin super favourites régulier ) 6) Vous y êtes ! Toute contribution est la bienvenue: code/ tests debug / traductions / dons, notre adresse mail et paypal : 007.nux@gmail.com
extension.news: Beta relese 1.1.2 beta 3 Contributions: ----------------- Thank's to Adulescente for hard testing

extension.description: Diaspora TV addon
Πρόσθετο Διασπορά ΤΒ
Playlist Loader
Playlist Loader
extension.news:
1.3.0 - Added default icons. - Added transparency to existing icons for better themes integration. - Added virtual directories feature allowing a better categorization of m3u lists. - Refresh favourites list when moving an item. - Ability to move playlists root and directories sides. - Refresh playlists and directories when moving an item. - Disabled TvDb and MovieDb for now ( waiting for improvements )
1.2.1 - Taking ownership of the addon, see : https://github.com/avigdork/xbmc-avigdork/pull/8#issuecomment-416955692 - Fixed regex => grouping issue when tvg-logo was empty. - Added icon image also when items are grouped. - Regex fix for title containing comas. - Added TheTvDb scan for each lists in contextual menu ( beta ).
